section.title: Adding a Storage Manager
section.para: The procedure describes the steps to add a storage manager.

step.para: Navigate to StorageStorage Manager. Click Configuration.
Click Add a New Storage Manager.
Type in a descriptive name for the Storage Manager.
Type in the Host Name, IP Address, and Port of the agent. Select the Type. If using more than one zone, select which zone you want this agent assigned.
Type in a User ID and Password for the agent.
Click Validate to confirm that the user and password connects.
